mapper.update: update user_general_attribute set `position` = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, children = #{children,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
